OrgName.entry: SHEFFIELD PROPERTY AND REGENERATION COMMITTEE - SPARC

Desc.entry: A working group of the Sheffield Chamber of Commerce made up of professionals from construction, architects, surveyors, developers and legal advisors. Aims to engage with issues on behalf of Chamber members affecting regeneration and development issues within the city, in particular to act as a sounding board for the private sector.

Address.entry: Sheffield Chamber of Commerce and Industry

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Bi-monthly meeting, please contact for details
